# Unmanned Ground Vehicle (UGV) Robot System
### Reference Number: PW-PV-904-81448
#### Solicitation Number: 31184-222280/B

The procurement process for the Unmanned Ground Vehicle (UGV) Robot System has been conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The notice indicates a Competitive - Open bidding procurement method with the lowest price criterion.

## Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites proposals for a Unmanned Ground Vehicle (UGV) Robot System, which will meet the specific requirements outlined in the solicitation document. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Background
The National Research Council Canada requires a UGV Robot System that must include a sufficient payload, autonomous-drive software, and necessary user interface capabilities. The goods must be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario, with a maximum of 1 system to be received on or before March 31, 2023.

## Procurement Information

* Publication Date: November 15, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 30, 2022, at 14:00:00
* Contact Person: Frigon, Francine, Phone: (819) 743-4279
* Email: francine.frigon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Official Languages: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Technical Specifications

* The UGV Robot System must meet the specific requirements set out in the solicitation document.
* Delivery: The system must be received on or before March 31, 2023.
* Quantity: 1 system

## Tender Documents

The Unmanned Ground Vehicle (UGV) Robot System solicitation document is available for download at [www.canadabuys.ca](https://www.canadabuys.ca). The notice URL is not specified.
